description: Google Meet is a secure video conferencing platform that integrates with Google Workspace, facilitating remote meetings, screen sharing, and chat

tools.name: GOOGLEMEET_CREATE_MEET
tools.description: Creates a new Google Meet space, optionally configuring its access type and entry point access controls.

access_type.title: Access Type
access_type.description: Access control level for the meeting space.

entry_point_access.title: Entry Point Access
entry_point_access.description: Access control for meeting entry points.

end_time.title: End Time
end_time.description: The end time of the meeting in RFC3339 timestamp format (e.g., '2024-01-15T11:00:00Z' or '2024-01-15T11:00:00+00:00').

space_name.title: Space Name
space_name.description: The resource name of the Google Meet space in the format 'spaces/{space_id}'. Example: 'spaces/mV63iV9-KxoB'.

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: The start time of the meeting in RFC3339 timestamp format (e.g., '2024-01-15T10:00:00Z' or '2024-01-15T10:00:00+00:00').

meeting_code.title: Meeting Code
meeting_code.description: The meeting code of the Google Meet space.

tools.name: GOOGLEMEET_GET_MEET
tools.description: Retrieve details of a Google Meet space using its unique identifier.

space_name.title: Space Name
space_name.description: The unique identifier (space ID) for the Google Meet space. Provide only the raw space ID without the 'spaces/' prefix. Example: 'mV63iV9-KxoB'.

tools.name: GOOGLEMEET_GET_PARTICIPANT_SESSION
tools.description: Tool to get a specific participant session from a conference record. Use when you need to retrieve details about a particular participant in a past meeting.

name.title: Name
name.description: Required. Resource name of the participant. Format: conferenceRecords/{conference_record}/participants/{participant}

tools.name: GOOGLEMEET_GET_RECORDINGS_BY_CONFERENCE_RECORD_ID
tools.description: Retrieves recordings from Google Meet for a given conference record ID.

conferenceRecord_id.title: Conference Record Id
conferenceRecord_id.description: Unique identifier for the conference record.

tools.name: GOOGLEMEET_GET_TRANSCRIPTS_BY_CONFERENCE_RECORD_ID
tools.description: Retrieves all transcripts for a specific Google Meet conference using its conferenceRecord_id.

conferenceRecord_id.title: Conference Record Id
conferenceRecord_id.description: Unique identifier of the conference record.

tools.name: GOOGLEMEET_LIST_CONFERENCE_RECORDS
tools.description: Tool to list conference records. Use when you need to retrieve a list of past conferences, optionally filtering them by criteria like meeting code, space name, or time range.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Optional. User specified filtering condition in EBNF format. Filterable fields: `space.meeting_code`, `space.name`, `start_time`, `end_time`. Examples: `space.name = "spaces/NAME"`, `space.meeting_code = "abc-mnop-xyz"`, `start_time>="2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z" AND start_time<="2024-01-02T00:00:00.000Z"`, `end_time IS NULL`

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Maximum number of conference records to return. The service might return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 25 conference records are returned. The maximum value is 100; values above 100 are coerced to 100.

page_token.title: Page Token
page_token.description: Page token returned from previous List Call.

tools.name: GOOGLEMEET_LIST_PARTICIPANT_SESSIONS
tools.description: Tool to list all participant sessions for a specific conference record in Google Meet. Use this when you need to retrieve a list of participants who joined a particular meeting.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Optional. User-specified filtering condition in EBNF format. Filterable fields include `earliest_start_time` and `latest_end_time`.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: Required. The identifier of the conference record, in the format `conferenceRecords/{conferenceRecord}`.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Optional. Maximum number of participants to return. The service might return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 100 participants are returned. The maximum value is 250; values above 250 are coerced to 250.

page_token.title: Page Token
page_token.description: Optional. Page token returned from a previous list call, used to retrieve the next page of results.

tools.name: GOOGLEMEET_UPDATE_SPACE
tools.description: Updates a meeting space. Use this tool to modify the settings of an existing Google Meet space. Requires the Space resource in the request body and the space name in the path.

name.title: Name
name.description: Immutable. Resource name of the space. Format: `spaces/{space}`.

config.title: SpaceConfig

accessType.title: AccessType
accessType.description: Access type of the meeting space.

moderation.title: ModerationMode
moderation.description: The pre-configured moderation mode for the Meeting.

artifactConfig.title: ArtifactConfig

autoRecordingGeneration.title: AutoGenerationType
autoRecordingGeneration.description: Defines whether a meeting space is automatically recorded.

autoSmartNotesGeneration.title: AutoGenerationType
autoSmartNotesGeneration.description: Defines whether to automatically generate a summary and recap of the meeting.

autoTranscriptionGeneration.title: AutoGenerationType
autoTranscriptionGeneration.description: Defines whether the content of a meeting is automatically transcribed.

artifactConfig.description: Configuration pertaining to the auto-generated artifacts.

entryPointAccess.title: EntryPointAccess
entryPointAccess.description: Defines the entry points that can be used to join meetings.

moderationRestrictions.title: ModerationRestrictions

chatRestriction.title: RestrictionType
chatRestriction.description: Defines who has permission to send chat messages.

presentRestriction.title: RestrictionType
presentRestriction.description: Defines who has permission to share their screen.

reactionRestriction.title: RestrictionType
reactionRestriction.description: Defines who has permission to send reactions.

defaultJoinAsViewerType.title: DefaultJoinAsViewerType
defaultJoinAsViewerType.description: Defines whether to restrict the default role assigned to users as viewer.

moderationRestrictions.description: When moderation.ON, these restrictions go into effect.

attendanceReportGenerationType.title: AttendanceReportGenerationType
attendanceReportGenerationType.description: Whether attendance report is enabled for the meeting space.

config.description: Configuration pertaining to the meeting space.

updateMask.title: Update Mask
updateMask.description: Optional. Field mask used to specify the fields to be updated. Comma-separated list of fully qualified field names. Example: "config.accessType,config.moderationRestrictions.chatRestriction". Use "*" to update all fields.
